resources.string: Allows the app to get your precise location using the Global Positioning System (GPS) or network location sources such as mobile phone masts and WLAN. These location services must be turned on and available to your device for the app to use them. Apps may use this to determine where you are, and this may consume additional battery power.

Allows the app to get your approximate location. This location is derived by location services using network location sources such as mobile phone masts and WLAN. These location services must be turned on and available to your device for the app to use them. Apps may use this to determine approximately where you are.
Allows the app to view information about WLAN networking, such as whether WLAN is enabled and names of connected WLAN devices.
Allows the app to connect to and disconnect from WLAN access points and to make changes to device configuration for WLAN networks.
Allows the app to receive packets sent to all devices on a WLAN network using multicast addresses, not just your phone. It uses more power than the non-multicast mode.
"The phone will temporarily disconnect from WLAN while it's connected to %1$s"
A security policy is restricting the use of WLAN.
CT WLAN network connected. Contact 10000 or local shop for billing info.
"You will be connected to China Telecom's WLAN network. For details of the charges, please contact China Telecom customer service. Proceed?"
Start WLAN client. This will disconnect WLAN Direct™.
Start WLAN client. This will disconnect WLAN Direct™.
Any existing WLAN connection will be disconnected
Start WLAN Direct™. This will disconnect WLAN connection.
This will disconnect any existing WLAN connection
Start WLAN Direct™. This will disconnect WLAN connection.
